title: Just a year after Modiji's speech on freebie culture, BJB is promising free scooty?
selftext:
Anyone wanting reference of what I'm talking - [https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/assembly-elections/rajasthan-assembly-elections/bjp-releases-party-manifesto-in-rajasthan/articleshow/105253721.cms](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/elections/assembly-elections/rajasthan-assembly-elections/bjp-releases-party-manifesto-in-rajasthan/articleshow/105253721.cms)  


[https://www.news18.com/news/india/stop-free-revdi-culture-heritage-enough-for-ups-growth-what-modi-said-at-bundelkhand-e-way-launch-5565121.html](https://www.news18.com/news/india/stop-free-revdi-culture-heritage-enough-for-ups-growth-what-modi-said-at-bundelkhand-e-way-launch-5565121.html)  


Has any media channel questioned Modiji on this?  


No wonder we need so many gods.
comments: Echange offer bhi hai kya? I need to change my scooter. ðŸ˜‚
They don't want a repeat of India shining. Freebie culture is always a race to the bottom.
BJP though people would have grown over freebies. After Karnataka loss they are doing the same.

BJP was also promising free scooties in the Delhi election that they lost, and followed with the freebie/rewdi-culture speech. They're like teflon. They'll say one thing, do the opposite, but nothing sticks.
At least give something ,which can improve their life standards ,like free electricity
Ab public hi aisi hai toh Modi ji karey kya.. /s

Yup they took have folded now. That's the slippery slope with freebies , if you want to stay relevant you too jump in ultimately the minority which pays tax bears the cost. And they will look for a way out. 

We are sliding down the proverbial slippery slope , all aboard!
nonsense, even BJP's manifesto in KA had plenty of "freebies"
Modi wants to do india shining but cant
